Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: teachers mark things and give feedback based on a rubric, AI doesnt have a rubric so some of the improvements were completely irrelevant to the task.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI goes into more depth, most responses are paragraphs long while teachers have to give feedback to lots of students and give meaningful feedback but its usually not as long.
